title: BRIEF-Sunland Group Announces A$50 mln, Five Year Unsecured Note Exchange Offer
text:
BRIEF-Sunland Group Announces A$50 mln, Five Year Unsecured Note Exchange Offer

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 09:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Sunland Group Announces A$50 mln, Five Year Unsecured Note Exchange Offer Oct 4 (Reuters) - Sunland Group Ltd : * SUNLAND ANNOUNCES A$50 MILLION, FIVE YEAR UNSECURED NOTE EXCHANGE OFFER * NEW NOTES WILL BE ISSUED WITH A DENOMINATION OF A$1,000 SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM INITIAL SUBSCRIPTION PARCEL OF A$50,000 AT 6.20% PA

BRIEF-Sunland Group Announces A$50 mln, Five Year Unsecured Note Exchange Offer
description: BRIEF-Sunland Group Announces A$50 mln, Five Year Unsecured Note Exchange Offer
